# Contributing to IXL Assistant

## Getting Started

1. Fork the repository
2. Clone your fork: `git clone https://github.com/YOUR_USERNAME/ixl-assistant.git`
3. Create a new branch: `git checkout -b feature/your-feature`
4. Install dependencies: `npm install`

## Development

- Make your changes
- Run linter: `npm run lint`
- Format code: `npm run format`
- Run tests: `npm run test`
- Test the extension in `chrome://extensions`

## Submitting Changes

1. Push to your fork
2. Create a Pull Request with a clear description
3. Ensure all CI checks pass

## Code Style

- Use 2-space indentation
- Use single quotes for strings
- Use semicolons
- Follow ESLint rules

## Testing

Please write tests for new features and ensure all tests pass before submitting a PR.
